title: Ankle sprain
patientBody:
## Discharge advice

You were treated today for an ankle sprain.

Home care advice:
- Rest the ankle and avoid painful activities.
- Ice for 15–20 minutes at a time, several times per day for the first 48 hours.
- Compression with a brace or bandage can reduce swelling.
- Elevate the ankle above heart level when resting.

Weight bearing: {{weight_bearing}}. Use support as needed.

Pain relief: {{analgesia}}

## Return to ED urgently if you develop:
- Increasing pain, swelling, or numbness
- Inability to bear any weight after 48 hours
- Fever, redness, or spreading warmth

## Follow-up
{{followup_timeframe}}.
